abstract: Create app intents and entities to integrate your app’s journaling functionality with Siri and Apple Intelligence.
overview:
## Overview

To integrate your app’s journaling capabilities with Siri and Apple Intelligence, you use Swift macros that generate additional properties and add protocol conformance for your app intent and app entity implementation that Apple Intelligence needs.

For example, if your app allows someone to create a new journal entry, use the [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppIntent(schema:)] macro and provide the assistant schema that consists of the `.journal` domain and the [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AssistantSchemas/JournalIntent/createEntry] schema:

To learn more about assistant schemas, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Integrating-actions-with-siri-and-apple-intelligence]. For a list of available app intents in the `.journal` domain, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AssistantSchemas/JournalIntent].

### Make sure your entity meets requirements

If you use app entities to describe custom data types, annotate the app entity implementation with the [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppEntity(schema:)] macro. This makes sure Siri and Apple Intelligence can understand your data. For example, the intent in the previous section uses `JournalEntity`. The following code snippet shows how the `JournalEntity` implementation uses the [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppEntity(schema:)] macro:

The assistant schema for the `JournalEntity` consists of the `.journal` domain and the [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AssistantSchemas/JournalEntity/entry] schema.

For a list of available app entity schemas in the `.journal` domain, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AssistantSchemas/JournalEntity].

items.description: Assistant schema conformance for app intents that offer journaling functionality.
items.name: AssistantSchemas.JournalIntent

items.description: Assistant schema conformance for app entities that describe journaling data.

title: Making journaling actions available to Siri and Apple Intelligence
